title: my gmail account  hase ben hack
body: a couple of minutes ago someone hacked me gmail my acc. and I can not get in the mail anymore. and on that mail I have a more then of one acc. with skins that are important to me, as well as that I started recording for the YouTube.and this is my one acc.which is connected to my youtub.Whether there is a possibility to change the code somehow or  to change the mail

replies.body: Reach out to our account recovery team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to help out with your email after verifying yourself and the creator of the account.
